overview:
Paul Sparrow is a sales and marketing executive with over 25 years of experience in establishing scalable revenue-generating infrastructures in diverse environments including Start-Up, Turnaround, Emerging-Growth, Private Investment and Fortune 50. He has successfully marketed and sold software/technology solutions in a variety of channels resulting in sales generation as high as $306M.

Prior to joining GreenWizard Mr. Sparrow served as Senior Vice President of Sales & Marketing at Cambar Solutions, a supply chain/logistics software firm facing rapidly declining revenues. As a result of establishing an effective sales engine, coupled with driving strong market awareness, Robocom Systems International acquired Cambar in January 2011.

From 2006 to 2009, Mr. Sparrow was Senior Vice President of Sales & Marketing at Benefitfocus.com, Inc., the leader in software and services for the healthcare benefits market providing “Quote to Claim” technology for both enterprise and consumer applications. Company sales and revenue more than doubled during under his leadership at Benefitfocus.
